title: Crustaceans: lobsters, barnacles, shrimps and their relative
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and William A. Anderson
brief_description: The appearances, habitat and behaviour of the most important types of Crustaceans are shown. The distinguishing features of the five tuypes are illustrated with close-up views of the animals in their natural environment. Designed for high school classes in biology and zoology.
